pages.text: You may have noticed that you can walk through leaves by now. If not... surprise! Also, many are fluffier and grass is everywhere thanks to these mods.
Walk or fall through leaves! If you don't want to fall through them craft some leaves with a book! Place it on your boots in an avil! Voila!

You can safely disable Better Foliage if your FPS is suffering as it's a client side mod. It will make leaves and grass smooth and square like traditional Minecraft if you do. Passable Leaves offers a simple Leafwalker enchant for boots (craft any enchanted book with a leaf block) if you want to walk on the leaves like a master!
